legend_0090_friend_02:
Well, this is the lab.\c
I used to come here to play all the time when I
was a kid.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0090_friend_03:
There’d better be a good reason for calling us
here like this...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0090_friend_05:
Everyone always says...[VAR 1107(00FF,0001)]she’s some kinda genius.
Absolutely brilliant as a Pokémon Professor.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0090_friend_07: But let me tell you—as a parent? [VAR 1107(00FF,0102)]ShHe’s the worst.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0090_friend_08:
All [VAR 1107(00FF,0001)]she ever does is work. [VAR 1107(00FF,0102)]ShHe never comes home.\c
I don’t have a single memory of h[VAR 1107(00FF,0202)]erim ever even
playing with me—h[VAR 1107(00FF,0202)]eris own kid.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0090_friend_09:
Mabosstiff’s the only one who was there for me.
Always.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0090_friend_10: Anyway. It’s open now. Go on in.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0090_friend_11: I just want to get this over with![VAR 0114(0006)]
